Body:
low_bound, high_bound, x_max, y_max, low_line, high_line = (lib_arai.
    get_SCAT_box(self.b, self.x_mean, self.y_mean, self.beta_threshold))
good = [(2.0, 1.9), (1.0, 5.0), (5.0, 1.8)]
bad = [(1.0, 2.0), (3.0, 4), (7.1, 0.2)]
for xy in good:
    result = lib_arai.in_SCAT_box(xy[0], xy[1], low_bound, high_bound,
        x_max, y_max)
    self.assertTrue(result)
for xy in bad:
    result = lib_arai.in_SCAT_box(xy[0], xy[1], low_bound, high_bound,
        x_max, y_max)
    self.assertFalse(result)
